title: YOUTUBE | 2012.9.16 The Chinese government admits a civic anti-Japanese riot and pillage
content:
The barbarous Chinese has caused the riot. The Chinese government has also neglected such a riot. However, China has not reported any such riot diplomatically. It is necessary to tell the act of barbarism of such China which is an advanced nation and it does not obtain all over the world.

YOUTUBE | 2012.9.16 The Chinese government admits a civic anti-Japanese riot and pillage

视频在youtube上，如墙内读者无法观看，请发电邮至cdtchinese@chinadigitaltimes.net，标题中请包括”youtube”字样，数字时代将提供观看工具。
